name: Sonic 2600
description:
Sonic the Hedgehog is now on the Atari 2600! Dr. Robotnik is up to no good and it's up to Sonic to collect the 6 emeralds and defeat him!

(Yes, I am aware this game looks and controls like crap. That is intentional.)

Controls:

A / D or < / > to Move

Z, W, ^, or Space to Jump
